text: 2|262|evarkaḷ taṅkaḷ poruḷkaḷai allāhvuṭaiya pātaiyil celavu ceytu (apporuḷai vāṅkiyavaṉukkut) tāṅkaḷ ataik koṭuttataṟkāka ikaḻcciyaiyum, tuṉpattaiyum (ataṉōṭu) cērkkavillaiyō avarkaḷukkuriya kūli avarkaḷiṉ iṟaivaṉiṭam avarkaḷukkuṇṭu. Mēlum, avarkaḷukku oru payamumillai; avarkaḷ tukkappaṭavum māṭṭārkaḷ
